antiSpamFilter.datastore

Class RulesConfigList

  • java.lang.Object
    • antiSpamFilter.datastore.RulesConfigList

  • public class RulesConfigList
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    rmnte-iscteiulpt Data algorithm to store rules and associated weights. This algorithm will make sure rules and weight are associated correctly, avoiding unnecessary checks from other classes.

    • Constructor Summary

      RulesConfigList(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> list)
      Constructor that takes a list of rules and applies default weight values to each one

      Constructor that takes both rule list and weight list, pairing them together

      • exportTo

        public void exportTo(java.lang.String path)
              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                     java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Exports current configuration list to a .cfg file on a specific folder
        Parameters:
        path - Path to the file that the file needs to be saved.
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - Exception if the file has a different enconding
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the file isn't found, shouldn't happen since its an export

      • importFrom

        public void importFrom(java.lang.String path)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Imports a configuration list from a given .cfg file. It verifies if the given list matches the list stored in the RulesUtility class.
        Parameters:
        path - The path pointing to the .cfg file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException with the BufferedReader

        The weight of the given rule
